mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectcode AS "projectCode", a.projectname AS "projectName", a.investtotal AS "investtotal", a.isdeductvtax AS "isdeductvtax", a.deductvtax AS "deductvtax", a.capitalprop AS "capitalprop", a.capitalamt AS "capitalamt", a.loanprop AS "loanprop", a.loanamt AS "loanamt", a.setupinterest AS "setupinterest", a.iscapitalcy AS "iscapitalcy", a.deptid AS "office.id", a.corp AS "corp", a.remarks AS "remarks",
office.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.deptid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_fundssrc( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, projectcode, projectname, investtotal, isdeductvtax, deductvtax, capitalprop, capitalamt, loanprop, loanamt, setupinterest, iscapitalcy, deptid, corp, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{investtotal}, #{isdeductvtax}, #{deductvtax}, #{capitalprop}, #{capitalamt}, #{loanprop}, #{loanamt}, #{setupinterest}, #{iscapitalcy}, #{office.id}, #{corp}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_fundssrc SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, projectcode = #{projectCode}, projectname = #{projectName}, investtotal = #{investtotal}, isdeductvtax = #{isdeductvtax}, deductvtax = #{deductvtax}, capitalprop = #{capitalprop}, capitalamt = #{capitalamt}, loanprop = #{loanprop}, loanamt = #{loanamt}, setupinterest = #{setupinterest}, iscapitalcy = #{iscapitalcy}, deptid = #{office.id}, corp = #{corp}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
